ygData.subject: Re: Need some serious help
ygData.msgSnippet: /begin rant They were just a bunch of conspiracy theorist idiots then.  Who in their right mind would even THINK of doing that?  Even if, for some bizzare
ygData.messageBody:
/begin rant
They were just a bunch of conspiracy theorist idiots then. Who in their
right mind would even THINK of doing that? Even if, for some bizzare
reason, you DID destroy it before suiciding, (if you had had it in the first
place) they would have "won" since you didn't have it anymore and would now
have to wait on another. What a bunch of morons. I would have had to give
them a huuuuuuge piece of my mind at that point. There isw just no excuse
for such stupidity.
/end rant

-=B=-
30th Forever on The Rathe
-----Original Message-----
From: Joshua R. Moore <josh@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, December 10, 1999 11:38 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Need some serious help


>From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>
>
>I offered that, and they said All that I had to do is destroy the mask
>before I suicide.
>They would not have given me a rez.
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
>Sent: Friday, December 10, 1999 11:25 AM
>To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Need some serious help
>
>
>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>You could have easily defended your honor, though at cost. Had you offered
>to suicide against the nearest frog and then given her permission to loot
>your corpse she would have seen you had no mask. Of course getting back
>there to get another would have been tough, and the lost xp sad. But more
>than likely the embarrassment her group would have felt after you killed
>yourself to prove your honor would have made them feel compelled to help
you
>get another. Might have even gotten a rez.
>
> Kitasi
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Josh Moore [mailto:josh@...]
>Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 8:41 PM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Need some serious help
>
>
>From: "Josh Moore" <josh@...>
>
>
>Well, I mosied on down to Lower guk, naked, following the excellent
>instructions given.
>Went down naked;)
>Made it to the Tower allright, and to the assassin room. This is where the
>MAnure hit the proverbial fan (sighs sadly).
>I waited to look up the ladder until All the casting was done. I peeked my
>head up to see what the room looked like, and dropped back down.
>Not one second after I did this, some dark elf woman jumps down, and calls
>me a Thief. Loot thief. every name in the bloody book..
>all I said was "eh?"
>and she went on to say She saw me on the ladder, then the corpse
>dissappeared, then I "ran"
> I didnt run, I was at the bottom of the ladder, politely waiting for
>someoen to say "Carapace for loot, or Mask for loot"
>Supposedly, I "Stole" The mask, and now im going to be blacklisted, my name
>will mean nothing, no one will trust me. she start screaming out loud over
>shout, saying no one should trust me, that I am "an (insert colorful verb
>here) loot thief. No matter what I said to her, , or over Shout. no one
>would listen to me.(Lynriss was her name. Fibtik, Wokka, arthon where in
her
>group as well)
>I am, and forever will be, an honorable man. Truthful, and Honest.
>I tell you now that I did not loot a mask=(
>I am afraid that my name will be smeared all over the message boards, and
on
>the little black lists that some of the more anal people on my server
>follow.(Mithaniel Marr)
>I am asking you, as a friend. To please vouch for me, and defend me if you
>hear or see anythign about me, as obviously, my word means nothing.
>I do thank Rann for helping as much as he could. Thank you all
>
>-Martyn, the worried bard who does not loot steal, and would not to save
his
>life
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
